Featured Projects

From production applications to developer templates, we create tools and solutions that power modern web development.

Our Flagship Products

PhotoShip - Catalogue Generation At Large

Enterprise-grade OCR and image processing SaaS for e-commerce. Transform product catalogs, extract data from PDFs, and generate custom brochures with AI-powered processing.

OrangeGas - Headless CMS

A general-purpose CMS that empowers the way you create and manage content. Build collections, blogs, and rich text content with ease.

DocuGods

AI-powered document helper that simplifies the process of applying for government IDs like Aadhar, PAN, Voter ID, and more.

PasteViz

A modern web application built with Svelte that allows users to generate and embed analytics/visualizations on the fly.

Batch GeoCoding API

A powerful Express.js API for batch geocoding addresses. Built with TypeScript, Prisma ORM, and MySQL.

Fillo - AI Form Filler

AI-powered Chrome extension that intelligently fills form fields on localhost development sites. Support for multiple AI providers and smart caching for efficient development.

Hypermedia Sync

Real-time synchronization experiments using hypermedia-driven architecture. Sync 10,000 checkboxes across browsers with Server-Sent Events and HTML fragments.

Angular-httpshooter

An AngularJS factory that manages HTTP calls asynchronously, ensuring single-threaded communication between server and client.

Go HTMX Templates

Production-ready Go templates featuring HTMX, Templ, Echo, and Tailwind CSS for building modern web applications.

PhotoCaml App in OCaml with Dream

PhotoCaml App in OCaml with Dream
